item.title: DF2 on Xfire
item.author: invalid@example.com (Harton)
item.dc:creator: Harton
item.content:encoded:
Xfire is an IM gamer application that recognize the game you are playing counting the hours in your profile, manage screenshots, and your contacts can see the game you ar playing, even the server, allowing to connect to the server your friends are playing with a simple click. It also let you chat with your contacts ingame, without needing to minimize.


Some mods of Unreal Tournament 2004 are already supported by xfire but it's not the case for DF2. So...

DF2 on Xfire

item.title: Couple more suggestions
item.author: invalid@example.com (!!_}U~M~G{_||_{FeAR}!)
item.dc:creator: !!_}U~M~G{_||_{FeAR}!
item.content:encoded:
1. More varied alt fires, like switching firing rate, grenade launcher, etc.
2. More weapons. Couple kinds of assault rifles, couple kinds of SMGs, and a couple types of pistols. Is there already a sniper rifle? A flamethrower wouldn't hurt either.
3. Dual wielding for all pistols and SMGs, with the ability to create combos of differnt ones.
4. An energy based weapon or two.


This would make DA2 the ultimate Mod!!
